title: Lunch and Learn Webinar Schedule
description: A regularly updated schedule of Lunch and Learn Webinars for R users at Nelson\\Nygaard.
contents:
Below is a regularly updated list of the upcoming scheduled Lunch and Learn webinars for R users at Nelson\Nygaard. Until such a time as we decided to change the time slot, these will be scheduled in perpetuity from 12 - 1 p.m. Pacific time on Wednesdays on a bi-weekly basis. Refer to the table below for specific dates and topics. Occasionally, if Bryan has an especially busy project load, is taking vacation, there is an intersecting NN holiday, or there is a lack of topics, these will be canceled or moved. Advanced notice will be provided for these occasions. Please provide feedback on the schedule if you would like a topic scheduled sooner or would like to add additional topics by contacting Bryan directly. {"x":{"filter":"top","filterHTML":"
","data":[["2021-02-17","2021-03-03","2021-03-17","2021-03-31","2021-04-14","2021-04-28","2021-05-12","2021-05-26","2021-06-09","2021-06-23","2021-07-07","2021-07-21","2021-08-04","2021-08-18","2021-09-01","2021-09-15","2021-09-29","2021-10-13","2021-10-27","2021-11-10","2021-11-24","2021-12-08","2021-12-22"],["2021.02","2021.03","2021.04","2021.05","2021.06","2021.07","2021.08","2021.09","2021.10","2021.11","2021.12","2021.13","2021.14","2021.15","2021.16","2021.17","2021.18","2021.19","2021.20","2021.21","2021.22","2021.23","2021.24"],["R Programming Basics Session 2","GitHub + Best Practices for Starting an R Project","Work Share Session 1","Working with Dates and Times","Working with Text Strings and Regular Expressions","Plotting with R","Survey Analysis","Work Share Session 2","Using R as GIS Software, Static Map to Illustrator Process","A Deeper Dive into TidyCensus and Using Census/ACS Data in R","More Google APIs: Geocoding, Places, Distance Matrix, Isochrones","Work Share Session 3","Leaflet mapping best practices","Shiny Session 5: Advanced UI Elements and Layout","Shiny Session 6: Advanced Server Side Topics","Work Share Session 4","R Markdown","Bookdown, distill, Github pages","TBD","Work Share Session 5","Database basics","Using R with SQL Databases","Work Share Session 6"]],"container":"
Date Session ID Topic
","options":{"paging":false,"info":false,"autoWidth":true,"order":[],"orderClasses":false,"orderCellsTop":true}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: R Software Versions and Users
description: A regularly updated list of R Software Versions and Users at Nelson\\Nygaard.
contents:
This page is a regularly updated list of R software versions and users at Nelson\Nygaard. The lists are maintained to easily track: Which software versions are the current recommended versions which users have up to date software versions Any other user specific information Software Versions Below are the current recommended versions for the NN recommended R software bundle. Software Recommended Version Download Link R 4.0.3 https://www.r-project.org/ RStudio 1.4.1103 https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/ RTools 4.0.0 https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/ Git 2.30.0 https://git-scm.com/download/win R Users The below is a list of the known R users at Nelson\Nygaard. This list is used to maintain information on software versions, knowledge/skill levels, and to maintain a central repository for R work requests. If you donâ€™t see yourself on this list and want to be added, if any information is incorrect/needs to be updated, or you want to add an additional field, please add comments to the Google sheet where this information is drawn from or contact Bryan. {"x":{"filter":"top","filterHTML":"

title: Recommended Reading
description: A regularly updated list of the best books & websites to read for gaining R skills and knowledge.
contents: Stay tuned for a recommended reading list!
